hold_time.description: The time to hold the interact button.

decay_rate.description: The amount of hold decay per second if the button is released

instant_reset_on_release.description: [bool]If true, progress instantly resets to 0 progress on release

hold_direction.description: Sets which direction must be held. Defaults to random.

animation_variable.description: [string]Name of the animation variable to control with the progress value

animation_value_min.description: The minimum value for the range set to the animation variable

animation_value_max.description: The maximum value for the range set to the animation variable
